Hi Devs… Solutions Partner here. I’m working with a third-party company to build a custom *integration between HubSpot and Infor Syteline* (ERP system for manufacturers). We are looking to bring the *“Updated by User ID”* field for Contacts and Opportunities from HubSpot into Syteline, but comes back as blank. This is not a traditional property, but is available when hovering over the details of a property to see revision history. *Does anyone know if there is any way to get this data?*
It's probably because you have an `after:10` in the search body. That's going to say "get the next page of results, after the 10th result", but there are only 5 results, so there isn't a second page
